sentences.english: Without respect, love cannot go far.
sentences.chinese: 愛情如不能相敬如賓，則無結果。

sentences.english: Final ability is turn for spouse concern, the wife is guest photograph Jing Rubin.

sentences.english: But I believe more in the sacred of the ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 但是我更相信平凡中的相敬如賓。

to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions

to have a grudge against
lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord

to quarrel/to bicker/glib repartee

depressed/sulky/moody/unhappy
to modestly decline
